mapper.insert:
select workRecord_seq.nextval from dual
insert into workRecord(cmp_no,memNo,cmp_status,cmp_in,cmp_month) values(#{cmpNo},#{memNo},#{cmpStatus},#{cmpIn},#{cmpMonth})
mapper.select: select * from workRecord where memNo=#{memNo} and cmp_month=#{cmpMonth} order by cmp_regdate desc
mapper.update: update workRecord set cmp_out=#{cmpOut}, cmp_status=#{cmpStatus} where cmp_no=#{cmpNo}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from workRecord where memno=#{memNo} order by cmp_regdate desc) where rownum = 1
